message: All services pages and Vue components created successfully
notes: All pages use PortalLayout with authentication checks
Mock data provided for demonstration - ready for composables integration
VPN Server: WireGuard configuration with peer management and QR code support
VPN Client: Profile management with connect/disconnect and config import
QoS: Traffic shaping rules with priority-based classification
DDNS: Dynamic DNS configuration with multiple provider support
All components follow Tailwind CSS 4 patterns with dark mode support
Forms use modal overlays with proper validation
Components are fully typed with TypeScript interfaces
